## Review Checklist (for reviewers)
- [ ] Contribution history verified (6+ months preferred)
- [ ] Code quality and review feedback assessed
- [ ] Code of conduct compliance verified
- [ ] Conflicts of interest checked
- [ ] Team fit evaluated
- [ ] Probationary period planned

## Approval Process
- [ ] Background check completed
- [ ] Organization owner review completed
- [ ] Permissions assigned
- [ ] Onboarding initiated
